storyContext.title: Display Source Citations in Chat UI
storyContext.story: As a frontend developer, I want to display the source documentation links alongside the chatbot's answers, so that users can verify the information and explore the original context.
storyContext.productGoalAlignment: This story enhances user trust and transparency by providing verifiable sources for chatbot answers, allowing users to delve deeper into the information and fostering a more reliable and informative user experience.

dependencies.dependency: Backend chat_service (from Story 2.3 and 2.4, needs modification to extract and yield citations)
Frontend useChat hook (from Story 2.4, needs modification to handle citation events)
ChatBubble component (from Story 2.2.a, needs modification to render citations)
docs.hmsreg.com (the source of the documentation links)

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Backend returns source URLs (citations) in the response metadata.
Frontend displays these as clickable links at the bottom of the bot's chat bubble.
Clicking a link opens the docs.hmsreg.com page.
